nodes.text: The Kyuzo language was the native tongue of the sentient Kyuzo species. The bounty hunter Embo spoke it and fellow bounty hunter Sugi and Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker were able to understand it, as were Cad Bane, Moralo Eval, and Obi-Wan Kenobi.

The Kyuzo language was developed for Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series by series supervising director Dave Filoni and is comprised primarily of intentionally mispronounced French words. The source material for these words were children's books about The Smurfs.
